text: Carlos Latuff (born November 30, 1968), in São Cristovo (Rio de Janeiro, Brazil), is a Brazilian political cartoonist of Lebanese origins who works independently. His works are concerned with a wide range of themes, including anti-globalization, anti-capitalism, and anti-Americanism and anti-military intervention. Furthermore, the issue for which he is most famous are his photographs depicting the Arab-Israeli conflict. Lattouf described his work as controversial. == Artwork == Some of Carlos Latuff's controversial artwork.
